When the 180 Australian athletes returned home from competing at the Montreal Olympics in 1976, the sporting-mad nation could not believe they had not brought a single gold medal home with them.

articles.title: Manchester United vs. Liverpool - Football Match Report - January 24, 2021 - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Get a report of the Manchester United vs. Liverpool 2020-21 English FA Cup, 4th Round football match.
articles.content:
Bruno Fernandes scored a stunning late free kick as Manchester United dumped Liverpool out of the FA Cup with a 3-2 win on Sunday and set up a fifth-round tie at home to West Ham next month.
